title: Tadej Pogačar Wins World Championship in Spectacular Solo Breakaway
content:
Ben O'Connor kicks to silver with a late-race attack, and Mathieu van der Poel defends his 2023 world title with bronze. Quinn Simmons 9th.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Wins World Championship in Spectacular Solo Breakaway on Velo.
author: ahood
